Name: Trueborn
Details: A trueborn is a Clan warrior born from the Clans' eugenics programs. The belief is that by combining the genetic material from heroic figures from Clan society, the resulting person would possess the best qualities of both. By the Clans, trueborn are considered inherently superior to natural "freebirths", and taught to believe that they are the only true inheritors of Aleksandr Kerensky's legacy.
